name: Reverse Streak
description:
Shoot enemy mother ships () to reverse controls and double the scores you earn from then on.

This is an entry to the Godot Wild Jam #39. Use left, right and space to move and shoot. Or use a game controller. On a touch device, touching the left side of the screen causes you to move left, and the right side to move right. You can shoot by touching the center of the screen.
